title: Nico-nii’s Photography Course
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Okay, say cheese!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Thank you very much, Nico-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Hm...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Um...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>This won’t do, this won’t do at all! Bzzt bzzt!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Hm...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Whenever you have your picture taken, you need to make it perfect. This is the mindset you need as a school idol, understood?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>H-huh...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>School idols are about dreams! About shining! About making everyone excited! So even if it’s just one casual photo, you need to give it your all!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>U-understood...! You make a good point, Nico-san. I’ll be sure to take those words to heart.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Good. Now, let’s practice taking the perfect picture before we retake the photo.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>W-wait, you mean... we’re doing “Nico-nico-nii” again...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Good guess. That’s exactly right. Do you remember what I said back then?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>“Make your voice sound sweeter, be aware of your hands down to the fingertips, and no shyness.” ...Right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Exactly. Now, Dia! Show me your all!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
